button.title: Buy Paper
button.tooltip: Pick up some more paper for making gift cards.

button.title: Make Paper
button.tooltip: Make your own paper to increase profits.

button.title: Make a greeting card
button.tooltip: Make a cute penguin-themed greeting card out of paper.

button.title: Make a book
button.tooltip: Make a book about how great penguins are.

button.title: Sell a greeting card
button.tooltip: Man your cart and sell a greeting card on the streets.

button.title: Sell a book
button.tooltip: Man your cart and sell a book on the streets.

button.title: Buy a book bindery

reset.message: You now make books instead of greeting cards!

button.tooltip: Shift your business to making books instead of greeting cards.

button.title: Buy Fabric
button.tooltip: Combine this with some fluff and you could sew something cute!

button.title: Make Fabric
button.tooltip: Make your own fabric to increase profits.

button.title: Buy Fluff
button.tooltip: Combine this with some fabric and you could sew something cute!

button.title: Make Fluff
button.tooltip: Make your own fluff to increase profits.

button.title: Make a Penguin Plushie
button.tooltip: Sew a penguin plushie using some fabric and fluff.

button.title: Make a Penguin Shirt
button.tooltip: Sew a cute penguin-themed shirt using some fabric.

button.title: Sell a Penguin Plushie
button.tooltip: Man your cart and sell a plushie on the streets.

button.title: Sell a Penguin Shirt
button.tooltip: Man your cart and sell a t-shirt on the streets.

button.title: Buy a Clothing Factory

reset.message: You now make penguin-themed shirts instead of plushies!

button.tooltip: Shift your business to making shirts instead of plushies.

button.title: Hire an employee

reset.message: You now have someone else to do some of the heavy lifting! Drag them onto a task to get them started.

button.tooltip: Hire an employee to help you out.

button.title: Buy another cart

reset.message: You now have another cart. You can sell more things at the same time.

button.tooltip: Buy another cart. You'll need this to have more than 1 employee selling things!

button.title: Buy a dirty zoo exhibit

reset.message: You've bought a dirty exhibit. With some cleaning it might be useful...

button.tooltip: It's not good for anything as is, but maybe with some cleaning...

button.title: Clean out the zoo exhibit

reset.message: The exhibit is now ready for occupants!

button.tooltip: Turn that dirty exhibit into a less-dirty exhibit!

button.title: Adopt a penguin

reset.message: You've adopted a penguin. She's so cute!

button.tooltip: Get a cute penguin for your exhibit.

button.title: Sell Penguin Tickets
button.tooltip: Sell tickets to see your penguins.

button.title: Expand the exhibit into a full zoo

click.message: You are now expanding this exhibit into a full-blown zoo.

reset.message: You've adopted dozens of animals and now you have a whole zoo!

button.reset: 1 Player, 1 Zoo, 15 Animals, 20 Spaces, 5 Free Spaces, 5 Tickets
button.tooltip: Turn that exhibit into a full zoo with dozens of animals.

button.title: Expand the exhibit into PenguinLand

click.message: You are now expanding this exhibit into PenguinLand.

reset.message: You've expanded the exhibit into a full penguin-themed amusement park!

button.reset: 1 Player, 1 PenguinLand, 10 Spaces, 5 Free Spaces, 4 Attractions, -5 Tickets
button.tooltip: Turn that exhibit into an amusement park devoted to penguins.

button.title: Buy another animal
button.click: -1 Player, -(500 * Lower Tariffs) - (1 - Lower Tariffs) * (1000 + 100 * Animals) Money, -1 Free Space
button.tooltip: Adopt another animal for your menagerie.

button.title: Sell Zoo Tickets
button.reset: 1 Player, 1 Ticket, 20 * clamp(10 * Horizontal Monopoly,1,10) Money
button.tooltip: Make some money off these animals! Traffic is based off of how many animals you own.

button.title: Build an attraction
button.tooltip: Turn some of that empty space into a fun attraction!

button.title: Build Penguin Housing

reset.message: You can now house 20 more penguins than before!

button.tooltip: Your new employees have to live somewhere!

button.title: Sell PenguinLand Tickets
button.reset: 1 Player, 1 Ticket, (20 + (Genetic Research)) * clamp(10 * Horizontal Monopoly,1,10) Money
button.tooltip: Rake in the dough. Traffic is based off of how many attractions you own.

button.title: Acquire more space
button.click: -1 Player, -(500 * Eminent Domain) - (1 - Eminent Domain) * (4000 + 200 * Spaces) Money
button.tooltip: Time to expand! Buy up some nearby property.

button.title: Hire an employee
button.tooltip: Hire an employee to help you out.

button.title: Sell a Card in the Gift Shop
button.hideuntil: 1 Genetic Research, 1 Vertical Monopoly, 1 Lower Tariffs
button.tooltip: Synergize by selling cards in the giftshop!

button.title: Sell a Book in the Gift Shop
button.tooltip: Synergize by selling books in the giftshop!

button.title: Sell a Book in the Gift Shop
button.tooltip: Synergize by selling books in the giftshop!

button.title: Sell a Book in the Gift Shop
button.tooltip: Synergize by selling books in the giftshop!

button.title: Sell a Plushie in the Gift Shop
button.hideuntil: 1 Genetic Research, 1 Vertical Monopoly, 1 Lower Tariffs
button.tooltip: Synergize by selling plushies in the giftshop!

button.title: Sell a Shirt in the Gift Shop
button.tooltip: Synergize by selling penguin shirts in the giftshop!

button.title: Sell a Shirt in the Gift Shop
button.tooltip: Synergize by selling penguin shirts in the giftshop!

button.title: Sell a Shirt in the Gift Shop
button.tooltip: Synergize by selling penguin shirts in the giftshop!

button.title: Genetic Modification Laws
button.hideafter: 1 Genetic Research, 1 Vertical Monopoly, 1 Lower Tariffs
button.tooltip: Get the restrictions on genetic modification research removed.

button.title: Commence Gene Therapy Trial
button.tooltip: Do some genetic research on one of your penguins.

button.title: Finish Gene Therapy Trials

reset.message: PenguinLand and your business are now staffed solely with sentient penguins. Ticket sales are through the roof!

button.reset: 1 Genetic Research, 1 Player, 20 Penguin Housing, (20 - Crew) Free Housing
button.tooltip: Time to apply your findings to a whole rookery of penguins.

button.title: Penguin Rights Laws
button.tooltip: Convince Congress to get sentient penguins full citizenship.

button.title: Vertical Monopoly

reset.message: You have bought a Paper manufacturing plant! No more paying for paper!

button.hideafter: 1 Genetic Research, 1 Vertical Monopoly, 1 Lower Tariffs
button.tooltip: Integrate a paper manufacturing plant into your business.

button.title: Horizontal Monopoly

reset.message: Your competition is gone. Increased profits!

button.tooltip: Convince Congress to elminate those pesky monopoly laws.

button.title: Lower Tariffs

reset.message: It is now significantly cheaper to import animals. Profits!

button.hideafter: 1 Genetic Research, 1 Vertical Monopoly, 1 Lower Tariffs
button.tooltip: Convince Congress that exotic animals shouldn't be expensive.

button.title: Eminent Domain

reset.message: You now have the power to seize land by paying only minor fees to the owners!

button.tooltip: Lobby to give your company Eminent Domain rights.
